metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42931 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: Logins saved by Firefox should be managed by the Password Manager componentwhich uses encryption to save files on-disk. Instead, the username (notpassword) was saved by the Form Manager to an unencrypted file on disk.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 106.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
